SummaryEnglish: Centuries ago, mankind abandoned planet Earth after the Vice, a race of mechanical aliens, drove them from their home into a life adrift in space. Now resigned to starships forged of pieces of Earth's shattered moon, the final hope for humanity lies in the hands of Actresses, young women born with the ability to wield the only weapons that can harm the Vice: Alice Gears, mechanical suits that can finally turn the tide against the alien incursion.

1.TitleEnglish: Heart Pounding! Actress Packed Mermaid Grand Prix! Shitara
1.SummaryEnglish:
The M-1 Tag Team Grand Prix finally kicks off! The race will determine the top mermaid and winner of 10 million yen! Too bad there’s a big frog and a cyclone in the way.
This Episode has three different Endings, this is the Shitara-Ending.

2.TitleEnglish: Heart Pounding! Actress Packed Mermaid Grand Prix! Yumi
2.SummaryEnglish: The M-1 Tag Team Grand Prix finally kicks off! The race will determine the top mermaid and winner of 10 million yen! Too bad there’s a big frog and a cyclone in the way. This Episode has three different Endings, this is the Yumi-Ending.

3.TitleEnglish: Heart Pounding! Actress Packed Mermaid Grand Prix! Sugumi
3.SummaryEnglish: The M-1 Tag Team Grand Prix finally kicks off! The race will determine the top mermaid and winner of 10 million yen! Too bad there’s a big frog and a cyclone in the way. This Episode has three different Endings, this is the Sugumi-Ending.

4.TitleEnglish: 特別番組「アリス・ギア・アイギス Expansionみんな！観てくれてありがとう！これからもよろしくね！隊長さんスペシャル！」
4.SummaryEnglish:
アリス・ギア・アイギス Expansion 特別番組

■特別番組「アリス・ギア・アイギスExpansionみんな！観てくれてありがとう！これからもよろしくね！隊長さんスペシャル！」

詳細情報
＜番組内容＞
前半のアニメコーナーではTVシリーズ全12話の映像の中から、アニメオリジナルキャラ高幡のどかの視点で成子坂製作所（仮）の日々を振り返る、題して「成子坂製作所（仮）Memories」を放送。後半のトークコーナーではメインキャラクターを演じた声優の沼倉愛美さん（比良坂夜露役・山野薫子役）、根本京里さん（高幡のどか役）、そしてアリスギアEX監督の花井宏和さんの三人が、ここでしか聞けない制作の裏話などを熱く語ります。
＜出演＞
沼倉愛美（比良坂夜露役・山野薫子役）
根本京里（高幡のどか役）
花井宏和（監督）

1.SummaryEnglish: After a successful operation carried out by an AEGiS attack unit, Nodoka Takahata seeks a job as an Actress, a woman born with the ability to wield mechanical suits.

2.TitleEnglish: Actresses VS Maintenance Crew! / Welcome to the Actress Cafe!
2.SummaryEnglish: Amid moving into a new office, Shitara finds something and proposes a showdown between the Actresses and the maintenance crew!

3.TitleEnglish: Terror! The Narikozaka Nightmare! / Ninpuu Raiya Gaiden
3.SummaryEnglish: Ghost stories and urban legends continue to exist 300 years into the future. There have been ghost stories at the factory for a long time... but what is the truth?

4.TitleEnglish: Festival Revelry! Narikozaka! (Preparations) / Festival Revelry! Narikozaka! (The Event)
4.SummaryEnglish: With a local festival coming to the area, Yotsuyu wants to use this as an opportunity to improve Narikozaka Manufacturing's image.

5.TitleEnglish: Terrifying Hiking?! / Fight on, Vapor Haze?!
5.SummaryEnglish: Nodoka is an avid hiker and wants to climb Mt. Takao with Yotsuyu. On the hike, she meets a long-tailed butterfly but finds something else the girls have never seen before...

6.SummaryEnglish: The Shimoochiai family finds tragedy when their oldest daughter Touka is murdered. Help may be on the way when Inspector Fumika Momoshina appears on the scene.

7.TitleEnglish: Yotsuyu-sama's a Former Delinquent?! / Life for the Maintenance Crew!
7.SummaryEnglish: Nodoka becomes suspicious when Yotsuyu starts coming home from work early. What’s going on here?

8.TitleEnglish: Nodoka in Wonderland / Narikozaka a La Carte
8.SummaryEnglish: Nodoka goes to work as usual, but everything is a bit unusual. Is it opposite day?

9.TitleEnglish: Rin-chan Expedition Party Mystery! Search for the Legendary Sasshie! / Fluff: The Terrifying Invader
9.SummaryEnglish: On Rin-chan's latest expedition, the team overcomes countless obstacles and dangers. What truth will Rin-chan uncover?

10.TitleEnglish: It's a Vacation to the South, Narikozaka!
10.SummaryEnglish: After spending some time in the water, the gang burns through too much money on gourmet indulgences and “bargain” shopping. What’s Yumi to do?

11.SummaryEnglish: It’s a quiet, rainy evening. It won’t stay quiet for long as mechanized chaos is right around the corner!

12.SummaryEnglish: All roads have led the Actresses here! It’s the gripping finale of Alice Gear Aegis Expansion!
